DOC.brief_summary: Patients undergoing transcatheter aortic valve implantation ( TAVI ) distinctive characteristic : old , frail , several co-morbidities take multiple medication . Hemodynamic instability , cerebral embolism , sedation , general anesthesia hospitalization intensive care expose patient postprocedural delirium . Acute neurocognitive dysfunction associate adverse outcome population . The objective study determine incidence delirium neurocognitive disorder elderly patient TAVI .
